value:
The emperor is not much for revelry.
Truthfully, Lord Berkut is forlorn.

Rigel also holds a festival at this time
of year. Everyone in the castle and
in the town is so happy... As am I.

If you're tired from dancing, why
not revive yourself with a treat?
I made this. Please try it.

Would you care for a dance?
Of course Lord Berkut won't
mind! You need not fret.

Oh my! You've caught me. Yes,
I bought this treat. I can't help
myself! Please don't tell Berkut.

I bear an invitation to a dance
festival from $Nf.
How shall I respond?

My heart is so light that my
feet must follow it.

What a nice rhythm. Shall
we dance another song?
Let us dance our sorrows away...

What a wonderful memento of
our time spent dancing together.
I shall always treasure it.

Hello! I am called Rinea. Shall
we head to the festival together
and, perhaps, dance?

Hello, there. Are you taking a
break? You look a little peaked.
Me? Oh, I'll dance some more!$k$pDoes that surprise you? Hee-hee.
I get that a lot. My love of dance
astounds even Lord Berkut.$k$pI love to dance so much... So much
so that, well, when I was a child...$k$pI told my parents I wanted to be a
dancer. They didn't take it very well.
I couldn't help myself, though!$k$pWhen I was young, I'd dance alone in
the forest...my only audience birds
and rabbits.$k$pNow, though, I can dance here,
in front of everyone. Even Lord
Berkut looks to be having fun.$k$pWhat a wonderful time. I'm so happy.
それっ
はいっ…
あっ…
そんな…
Together with you...
May I have this dance?
Lovely...
It's like a dream!
I wanted to be together...
giggle
Shall we dance?
One more song, then.
I absolutely adore dancing. Does that surprise you?
I would dance anywhere. The great hall of a castle, in the middle of a forest... Anywhere.
Of course, my partner for the night's final dance will be my lord Berkut.
I hope that I can enjoy this for just a little while longer...
I had such fun dancing with you. I will never forget this.
*humming*
This way?
With pleasure.
